scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run preview --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix frontend" "npm run lint --prefix backend"
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format --prefix frontend" "npm run format --prefix backend"
scripts.format:check: concurrently "npm run format:check --prefix frontend" "npm run format:check --prefix backend"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test --prefix frontend" "npm run test --prefix backend"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test --prefix frontend -- --watch" "npm run test:watch --prefix backend"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "npm run test:coverage --prefix frontend" "npm run test:coverage --prefix backend"
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.typecheck:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build -- --emitDeclarationOnly && cd ..
scripts.typecheck:backend: cd backend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.validate: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
